title: Interpretation of hearing someone’s name in a dream for a man, a married woman, and a single woman

preview.html: Hearing someone's name in a dreamThere are many interpretations of seeing hearing someone's name in a dream for a married and unmarried man, and many people always try to search for an interpretation of names, as there are names of boys and girls, and each name has a different meaning than the other. Seeing hearing someone's name in a dreamWhen a person sees in a dream that he hears the name Muhammad or Abdullah or Mahmoud, this means that the dreamer will attain goodness and happiness.When a person sees in his dream that he is calling someone by the name Mahmoud or Abdullah or Muhammad, this is a sign that he will hear good and happy news.Whoever sees in his dream that someone is calling him by a name that has a bad meaning and not good, this is a sign that many bad things will happen to the dreamer, or that he will hear bad news.Whoever sees in his dream that someone is calling him by his real name, this dream indicates the presence of the dreamer's message in getting closer to God, doing good deeds, and giving charity. Seeing the name of someone you love in a dreamIf a person sees in his dream the name of a person he loves and knows, this is a sign of his intense love for that person and always thinking about him.When a person sees in a dream a person he loves but is very busy with him, this means that you will soon hear news Happy. Read also: Interpretation of pigeons in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin Seeing hearing a person's name in a dream for an unmarried woman After learning about seeing hearing a person's name in a dream, we must also learn about seeing hearing a person's name in a dream for an unmarried woman. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that someone is calling her by one of the best names, this is a sign of the good that this girl will get and this dream is also evidence of her thinking in life. But if a woman sees in her dream that someone is calling her by a name that has a beautiful meaning, this is a sign of many good things that she will get in addition to blessings and happiness in everything related to the life she lives. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that someone is calling her Alia or Alia, this means that this girl will get a high position in her work and evidence of everyone's love for her. For an unmarried woman to see in her dream that someone is calling her by the name Sabreen is evidence that God will test her, but she will be patient and will eventually recover. For an unmarried woman to see in her dream that someone is calling her by the name Maria indicates that this girl has high morals, and this is also evidence that this girl will enjoy a lot of kindness And livelihood. Seeing hearing a person’s name in a dream for a married woman When a married woman sees in her dream that she is calling her son by one of the beautiful names of God, this is evidence that her son’s condition will improve for the better, and it is also evidence that this boy fears God in everything he does. If a married woman sees in her dream that someone calls her one of the names of the daughters of the Messenger, this indicates the love of that girl’s father for her and his satisfaction with her. If a married woman dreams that she calls her husband one of the names of the prophets, this means that her husband will improve his situation for the better. Seeing hearing a person’s name in a dream for a pregnant woman After learning the interpretation of hearing a person’s name in a dream for a matter

title: Interpretation of seeing a bear in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Here is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a bear in a dream, because the bear is a brutal predator that worries many people when they see it in their dreams, although scholars differ in their interpretation of seeing a bear in a dream. Whoever saw a vision of a human bear depends on the condition of the dreamer and the shape and behavior of the bear in the dream. Therefore, in our article today, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a bear in a dream through the opinions of scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Al-Nabulsi, as well as the difference between seeing a married woman and a pregnant or unmarried girl. . In detail in the encyclopedia, so follow us. The interpretation of seeing a bear in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Sirin believes that the interpretation of seeing a bear in a dream varies depending on the condition of the bear and the dreamer. For example: Whoever dreams that he is drinking bear’s milk, this is an indication that the dreamer will suffer from He will face many problems, sorrows, and fears in his life that may prevent him from achieving his dreams and aspirations. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for the dreamer who saw himself in a dream riding a bear and starting to move with it, he was in his human dream while the dreamer was traveling in a nearby place, and it may be for energy, and God is Most High and He knows best. Bear in a dream about Nabulsi. Imam Nabulsi will see that seeing a bear in The dream is in the form of a means of transport, meaning that the fortuneteller was climbing it in his dream and controlling it and controlling it. As for whoever sees in his dream that a large bear is attacking him, this is an indication of the presence of an enemy in the dreamer’s life who attacks him, hates him, is jealous of him, and tries to harm him, so the dreamer must Be careful, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees a bear in his dream and is very afraid of it, this is an indication of many problems, sorrows, and anxiety in the dreamer’s life, as it shows the dreamer’s inability to overcome all of these. Sorrows and troubles, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. The vision and interpretation differ greatly in the case of seeing small bears, as it is a sign of a lot of money, a lot of sustenance, and tremendous goodness that the dreamer will obtain, God willing. The bear in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen identifies a number of interpretations that differ depending on The state of the dreamer and the state of the bear, for example: Ibn Shaheen believes that whoever sees himself in a dream walking with a bear on the road, it is evidence of the presence of one of the traitorous friends present in the life of the dreamer, and that he sees the opposite of what is hidden, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But in the event that A person saw himself riding on the back of a bear and walking with him, then this is an indication that the dreamer will obtain a new job opportunity and there may be some travel, but this job opportunity will be beneficial to him and he will take the highest places, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for the dreamer who sees bears attacking him in his dream, this indicates However, there are many difficult problems, sorrows, and worries in the dreamer’s life, and he suffers from them seriously and does not know how to deal with them correctly, and God is supreme. And He knows best. Interpretation of seeing a bear in a dream for a single woman: If a single girl who has never been married sees that she is walking with a bear, this indicates that there is an evil and deceitful person in her life who is trying to get her, so she should be careful and stay away. From him wa

title: Interpretation of the unknown thief in a dream

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of the unknown thief in a dream, because theft is one of the major sins in Islam, and the Qur’an has put an end to it, which is cutting off the thief’s hand at the risk of life. A danger to individuals and the stability of societies. People cannot punish them. In this article, we will learn about the importance of seeing the unknown thief in different situations, so follow us. Interpretation of the unknown thief in a dream. Seeing a thief in a dream. Ibn Sirin says: Whoever sees in a dream that someone steals his shoes and wears them in front of him, then this dream indicates However, there is a man who cheats on his wife, and the dreamer knows about this evil and does not tell his wife. It is a warning to him to continue this ugly act. A person who sees in a dream that one of his relatives is stealing from him, then in reality the thief mocks the dreamer and speaks badly about him in front of others, so he should beware of him, and be careful in what he says about him. Interpretation of a dream about a thief in the house and he did not steal anything. One of the most promising visions is for a person to see in his dream that there is a thief trying to enter his house without stealing anything from him. This vision symbolizes the presence of a sick person in this house and God Almighty will give him treatment and wellness. The dream of the unknown thief who saw it. A thief in his dream and he cannot recognize him because he is hiding his face, then this dream symbolizes that there is someone who is eavesdropping on the news of the priest without his knowledge and is good at hiding so that he does not notice it. That, and this person has envy and hostility. Some interpreters said that the unknown thief in a dream symbolizes the angel of death, because he takes people’s souls carelessly, and the meaning of seeing the unknown thief in a dream is the death of one of his children. And whoever sees in his dream an unknown thief, and that thief was an old man, This dream symbolizes that there is someone who speaks ill of him, and this person is one of his friends. But if the unknown thief is a young man, then there is also someone who speaks ill of him, but this person is one of his enemies. And if he sees that an unknown thief is stealing from his house without him being afraid or trying Escaping, then this dream means that he will marry one of the daughters of that house, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about stealing clothes: Stealing clothes in a dream is one of the fortuneteller’s warning visions. Likewise, this vision shows a woman that she is looking at a man other than her husband and is trying to seduce him. This dream is a warning to the dreamer that he deserves God’s wrath upon him if he continues this heinous act, and that God will expose him to public testimony.I steal in a dreamOne of the warning visions that a person can see is that he sees himself stealing something from someone he knows. This dream is a warning to him that he is spying on this person and monitoring his situation without his knowledge. Because he is exposing himself to the wrath of Almighty God.And if you want a different dream interpretation, you can use the Live Dream Interpretation application

preview.html: If the dreamer eats ice cream in a dream, and longs for it a lot, this indicates that he has achieved many things he wants in his life, such as work, travel, and marriage, and that seems good in his life. Interpretation of seeing ice cream in a dream for one girlIf a girl saw in a dream that she was eating ice cream Cream in a dream, and it was very delicious for her in a dream. It indicates that he will encounter good things and will live during this time, God willing, with a lot of sustenance and goodness. And the only girl who looks at ice cream and wants to buy it, but she could not dream and was sad. This is an indication of That there are things that are exhausting her in life and making her very sad at this time and at this time she is trying to overcome them. What if a single girl looks at ice cream and does not have money, so she can buy it in a dream while she is sad. This indicates that she is trying to achieve the goal that she wants in This time in her life, but she did not succeed. The unmarried girl saw in a dream that she was getting a large amount of ice cream, and she had been eating it for a while. This is an indication that she will reach something important in her life that she seeks, such as work or marriage, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of seeing ice cream in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing ice cream in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is eating a lot of ice cream and desires it. This is an indication of the happy married life that she will live in this time, God willing. And the married woman is a dreamer in a dream. She looks at ice cream and wants to buy it, but she cannot eat it. This is an indication that this married woman is trying to find something important in her life and she is desperately searching for it. And a married woman seeing in a dream that her husband gives her ice cream in a dream, and that was very beautiful in the dream. Here it is explained that she will live a period full of happiness, abundance and food in her life during this period. Either a married woman sees in a dream that she is looking for ice cream in the dream and does not find it in the dream and she is sad. This is an indication that she is facing great difficulties in her life and problems during this period and she was unable to get rid of it. Including.Interpretation of seeing ice cream in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she has a lot of ice cream in her house and she is happy. It indicates that she will experience a lot of goodness and nourishment in her life without getting tired or exhausted to find it. This is what a divorced woman looks like. To ice cream in a dream from afar, and she was upset because she did not eat it in the dream. It explains that she will make a wrong decision in her life and she will regret it a lot and will try to fix this problem. And a divorced woman sees in a dream that there is ice cream in her house, and in a small quantity in the dream, and she is happy about it. This is clear evidence that she will experience good things in the near future, and that she will enjoy them, God willing. The divorced woman who was seen in the dream eating ice cream with someone she did not know before and was happy. It indicates her close marriage to a good man in her life, who is He will make it

title: The Prophet’s supplication in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: But in general, the meaning of mentioning the prayer on the Prophet is one of the sentences that we mention in a dream, but it has many meanings that we see in the world because it is a good omen. Interpretation of seeing the Prophet’s prayer in a dream for a single girl: To see in her sleep a girl praying on the Prophet. It is considered one of the blessed visions as her prayer on the Prophet indicates the date of her imminent marriage. For an unmarried girl, the dream explains that she is a kind-hearted girl who has good morals and is close to God. If a girl dreams that she is praying on the Prophet. This indicates that a good young man will come to her and her marriage is near, God knows best. The dream also shows how happy you are in her life. But if the girl sees that someone is repeating the prayer behind her on the Prophet. The dream indicates that this single girl will have a righteous man who will marry her and she will be very happy with him. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she has written on her the prayer on the Prophet. The dream is a sign for the girl that she will soon hear happy news and will enjoy great kindness and abundant strength. An unmarried girl sees someone in her dream praying on the Prophet and has a great desire to repeat his example. The dream shows goodness and that the girl is waiting for the happiness that She will soon excel in the world. Seeing an unmarried girl sitting in a green garden in her dream and praying to the Prophet while she is in the garden. Seeing the girl means that an event will soon appear in front of her that she was not aware of in the previous period. See also: Praying in the street in a dream Interpretation of the Prophet’s prayer in a dream for a married woman Praying to the Prophet is an auspicious word. If a married woman dreams that she is praying to the Prophet. The dream is a sign that this married woman is good and that she will soon receive good news. But if she sees her husband in a dream, she is praying to the Prophet. The dream indicates that her husband will get a promotion at his job or that he will get a high position in authority. If a married woman dreams that she is sitting near her children and remembers praying to the Prophet in a dream. The dream shows how happy the woman is and that God honors her with the happiness in which she lives with her family. The woman has been waiting for her for a long time. Interpretation of seeing the Prophet’s prayer in a dream for a man and its meaning He saw a man in his sleep entering a mosque and there was a large and spacious area, and he was sitting in the mosque and praying to the Prophet repeatedly. The dream means that there is a wide and spacious diet soon. The dream also indicates that the man will get rid of Many problems surround him in his worldly life from everywhere. And a sign for him that after getting rid of these problems, God will give him happiness that he did not find in the last period of his life. If a person sees in his sleep sitting in a large place and reading the remembrance, and often mentions praying for the Messenger. It is indicated that the dream will soon come true in the presence of great happiness that the dreamer lives. Read also: Interpretation of a dream of praying for the Messenger for singles, married people and men Interpretation of seeing praying for the Prophet in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation Praying for the Prophet in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates many things. It indicates that her birth will be easy and
preview.text: But in general, the meaning of mentioning prayers upon the Prophet, it is one of the sentences that we mention in a dream, but it has many meanings that we see in this world because it is a good omen. Interpretation of seeing the Prophet’s prayers in a dream for a single girl: To see in her sleep a girl praying upon the Prophet. It is considered one of the blessed visions as it Her prayer for the Prophet indicates the date of her imminent marriage. For an unmarried girl, the dream explains that she is a good-hearted girl, has good morals, and is close to God. If the girl dreams that she is praying for the Prophet. This indicates that a good young man will come to her and her marriage is near, and God knows best. The dream appears Also how happy you are in her life. But if the girl sees that there is someone repeating the prayer behind her upon the Prophet. The dream indicates that this single girl will have a good man who will marry her and she will be very happy with him. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream, prayer upon the Prophet is written upon her. The dream is a sign for the girl that she will soon hear happy news and will enjoy great kindness and abundant strength. An unmarried girl sees someone in her dream praying to the Prophet and she has a great desire to repeat his example. The dream shows goodness and that the girl is waiting for happiness that will soon overtake her in the world. Seeing an unmarried girl A married woman is sitting in a green garden in her dream and praying for the Prophet while she is in the garden. A girl’s vision means that an event will soon appear before her that she was not aware of in the previous period. See also: Praying in the street in a dream. Interpretation of the Prophet’s prayer in a dream for a married woman. Praying for the Prophet is an auspicious word, If a married woman dreams that she is praying for the Prophet. The dream is a sign that this married woman is good and that she will soon receive good news. But if she sees her husband in a dream, she is praying for the Prophet. The dream indicates that her husband will get a promotion in his job or that he will get a job. A high position of authority. If a married woman dreams that she is sitting near her children and remembers praying for the Prophet in a dream. The dream shows how happy the woman is and that God honors her with the happiness in which she lives with her family. The woman has been waiting for her for a long time. Interpretation of seeing the Prophet praying in a dream for a man and its meaning: He saw a man In his sleep, he entered a mosque and there was a large and spacious space in it, and he was sitting in the mosque and praying for the Messenger was repeated repeatedly. The dream means that there will be a wide and spacious food system soon. The dream also indicates that the man will get rid of many of the problems that surround him in his worldly life from everywhere. It is a sign for him that after getting rid of these problems, God will give him happiness that he did not find in the last period of his life. If a person sees in his sleep sitting in a large place and reciting dhikr, and often mentioning prayers upon the Messenger. It is indicated that the dream will soon come true in the presence of happiness. A great experience for the dreamer. title: Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a divorced woman

preview.html: Therefore, it is considered one of the dreams that some people warn about, and it should not be confused with it. For clarification, let us read from your website gptafser.com/ the rest of the article that shows you the details. Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a single girl: Wearing a pure gold watch in the homes of an unmarried girl. It is a sign of... The happy moments that you will enjoy because of your great success. If the unmarried girl sees herself wearing a gold veil and is happy with it in a dream. The vision may indicate marriage to a person who treats her with great love and works for her comfort. But if the unmarried girl sees that she is going to a store, Gold and jewelry in a dream. It is a sign of happy events that make her very happy. In the event that an unmarried girl is already engaged and she saw that she was wearing a lot of gold in a dream. The dream indicated that her marriage is approaching or that she will get a new job through which she will earn a lot of money. Seeing her removing gold from her hand in a dream may symbolize an unmarried girl, due to the presence of problems that bother her regarding the dreamer’s personal life. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing gold in a dream. Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is buying gold, she becomes sad in a dream. He is going through some crises and problems that he faces in reality, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for the vision of a married woman giving gold to her husband in a dream, the vision may indicate positive changes that she and her husband are going through, and it is the reason for those changes. Whereas if a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is giving her a gift Of gold. It is a sign that there are some obstacles that the husband feels from his wife, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When you remove gold from the hand of a married woman in a dream. The excessive form of the vision suggests a solution to all the problems that both parties suffer from. It can indicate getting rid of crises. And difficulties and achieving happiness. If a stranger gives a married woman a gift of gold in a dream. The vision indicates that he will hear good news or that he will give birth to a good child. Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a man and its meaning. A married man’s dream of gold in a dream can only be interpreted according to what we see of the situation The dreamer. That is, if the married man sees himself in a dream wearing gold. The vision indicates some problems in the life of the dreamer. Or he will go through a difficult stage while seeing the gold. But if the married man sees that someone gave her a gift of gold in the dream. He will have a child or A child or he will obtain a high position during his work in reality. While you see a lot of gold in the house of a married man in a dream. It indicates that there is a lot of goodness in his house, but he does not look at this matter and does not care, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a person sees giving gold To his wife in a dream, this may indicate a married man. About the presence of changes in the life of the person with insight. It may indicate events that could bring about a change in the way of life of the person with insight and his family, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about a gift of gold in a dream. Meaning of seeing gold in Dream of a pregnant woman

title: Interpretation of seeing a crazy woman in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a crazy woman in a dream for a single woman. Seeing the point of a crazy woman in the dream of an unmarried girl, to happiness and great joy on the way to her. It also says that soon she will hear happy news that will change her life for the better. This vision may also indicate that the girl with the vision will get engaged to the person she loves in The very near future. Symbolizes sight. Crazy in the dream of an unmarried woman. A change in her psychological state for the better and gaining satisfaction and psychological peace. Interpretation of seeing a crazy woman in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a crazy woman in her dream, whether you know her or not, it is a sign indicating the abundance of sustenance, and a lot of goodness is given. To whomever sees it. This vision also indicates that this wife may have children in the near future and portends her a great future ahead of her. For a married woman, this vision may indicate that she is falling into major problems that will soon be resolved, God willing. Seeing a crazy man in a dream about a manSeeing moreWoman Crazy In a man’s dream, a good vision brings many good things to him. If a man can see a crazy woman in a dream, this is a sign of the tremendous sustenance that the one who sees the vision will receive in a legitimate way, God willing. It also indicates an improvement in his financial situation and career. Interpretation of a crazy woman’s dream In the dream of a divorced woman, see the point Crazy. In a woman’s dream, she is divorced, to change her situation for the better and enter into a new, successful and stable life, thanks to God. This vision also shows that she will be associated with a better husband than her ex-husband, for whom God will compensate her for the evil and damage she has suffered in her life. It also indicates that her psychological and social condition has improved. Often.Interpretation of seeing a crazy woman in a pregnant woman’s dream: For a pregnant woman, this vision carries good and bad interpretations. Seeing a crazy woman in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates a serious deterioration in her health that will affect her pregnancy and the health of her fetus. It can even lead to a miscarriage, which will create many health problems and is very difficult for For her. But the good side of the interpretation of this vision indicates that her health condition has improved again and that she will become pregnant again after the miscarriage. And that God Almighty will compensate her with a healthy and healthy child to compensate her for the loss of her firstborn, God willing. Seeing a crazy woman chasing me for marriage. If a married woman sees a crazy woman, you will chase her in In a dream, this is a sign that symbolizes abundant livelihood and abundance for the dreamer. Such a vision is good news for her grandchildren, God willing. This vision also indicates that the dreamer lives a life full of happiness and joy with her husband and among her children, and enjoys peace and psychological comfort. Interpretation of seeing a crazy woman chasing me for ManSee the point Crazy woman This is chasing the man in a dream with the imminent marriage of the visionary in the near future, God willing. This vision also shows the good circumstances of this man, and that he will live a good life, and great happiness in his life, God willing. Seeing the escape of a crazy woman chasing the fortuneteller See the point Escaping from a crazy woman in a dream About dismissal and dismissal from work. As this indicates

title: What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin seeing a rifle in a dream for good and evil?

preview.html: Get to know us: the interpretation of seeing a gun in a dream. It is a type of firearm that is used by resting it on the shoulder and then firing it. Soldiers often use it in battles, in addition to hunting enthusiasts using it to hunt birds and wild animals. In shooting matches, as it is one of most types of weapons, it is able to hit the target from a long distance, which makes some people fear it and are unable to catch it when they see it. There are many cases in which one can see a gun in his dream, whether he is the one aiming it at someone else. Or an animal, as he sees that it is targeting him and there is someone trying to hit him. To kill him, in both cases seeing it is among the disturbing nightmares from which the owner wakes up anxious in a state of tension and fear for his professional future and the future of his family and children. We show you the details of seeing this dream in the following paragraphs through the Encyclopedia. The interpretation of seeing a weapon in a dream by Ibn Sirin we present to you in the following paragraph. Interpretation of seeing a weapon in a dream, as stated by the scholar Ibn Sirin: Seeing yourself carrying a weapon in a dream indicates the dreamer’s rationality, wisdom, and strength. Seeing a gun in a dream is sometimes a good vision, and sometimes it is a bad vision that warns of the danger of approaching him or one of his relatives. Hearing the sound of shots indicates The viewer suffers from panic and fear of some things and things that he suffers from in his life. Buying a gun in a dream symbolizes marriage sooner or later, especially if the dreamer sees that he was able to hunt a rabbit or a deer, as this indicates the marriage of an unmarried woman to a man. Handsome or single marriage. A beautiful girl. Getting a weapon as a gift is good news for assuming high positions and a high position at work or for academic excellence. The meaning of seeing a gun in a dream Sometimes a gun indicates the approach of happy occasions and the celebration of weddings due to the traditions and customs that are held in some countries with the celebration of shooting. Seeing a gun represents Achieving profits and gains, whether they come from the dreamer’s work or wealth acquired by the dreamer. For the fortuneteller to point a gun at a familiar person is a sign of disagreements and conflict between them. A person chasing the dreamer and pointing his weapon at him shows his desire to harm him, while he managed to shoot him with the gun and then hit him As an ominous sign of imminent danger to the dreamer directed by this person. Precautions must be taken. Being injured by a gunshot and bleeding from the body indicates that the injured person is extravagant and must be frugal in his spending, otherwise he will be afflicted with poverty and destitution. While Imam Al-Nabulsi said: If he sees a weapon when the person seeing it hits a sheep or a cow, he is committing slander against him. Chaste, God forbid, and chasing a man with a weapon indicates his disobedience and lusts. Interpretation of seeing a gun in a dream for a single woman: Individual visions often relate to what she actually dreams of and desires, which is often related either to her education and future or to her marriage. We will explain the interpretations of all the cases in which you may see a gun in a dream: The gun indicates

title: Interpretation of wounds in a dream on the head, leg, hand, and in different places, for good and evil

preview.html: Through this article from the encyclopedia, we study in detail the interpretation of wounds in a dream. In different cases, the dream world carries many disturbing symbols that dreamers believe convey the hidden messages they need to learn their idea. Among these symbols is the symbol of a wound that the dreamer sees on many occasions. The dreamer can see that he has been injured in his arm, leg, or head, and each of these cases has a different meaning and significance from the other. Interpretation of wounds in a dream by Ibn Sirin, but this vision indicates that something bad has happened to the dreamer, so what did the dream interpreters say about the meaning of this vision, and this What we will show you in the following lines. A head wound in a dream. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he has a wound in his head that causes him pain, then this is a sign that he is going through tremendous psychological pressure in his life, which makes him feel anxious in reality. If the dreamer sees several wounds in his head, this is A sign of blessing in his life. However, if the wound that was inflicted on his head was deep in his head, then this indicates a material loss, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees that he is wounding someone in the head and betraying him in the dream, this indicates that the dreamer will defeat those who hate him and hate him. When The dreamer dreamed that he suffered a large hemorrhage on his head as a result of being hit by a strong blow from someone in the vision. The meaning of this dream lies in the fact that the dreamer suffered from injustice in reality. And God knows best. But when the dreamer dreams that he is hitting someone hard on the head, causing him to bleed profusely, this indicates that the dreamer obtained money illegally. Seeing a wound on her head in a dream for a married woman indicates that her married life will be disrupted in reality. If the dreamer is really sick and sees that he is bleeding profusely from his head, then this vision is promising for him to recover from the illness, and God knows best. Seeing bleeding from the head in a dream symbolizes the coming of comfort and comfort for the dreamer because he was suffering from worries in his life. Hand wound in a dream regarding the meaning of seeing a hand Being wounded in a dream has been interpreted by dream interpretation scholars as an indication that the dreamer is exaggerating in spending his money in reality. Seeing a wound on his hand in a dream symbolizes getting rid of the difficulties and problems that the dreamer faces. When the dreamer sees that he has a glass wound on his hand, this indicates Indicates that he will earn a lot of money. Seeing the hand encased in glass has an unpleasant connotation, because it expresses that he is going through an emotional crisis, as well as his isolation from reality. If a pregnant woman sees a wound on her hand in a dream, this means that her health condition has improved in reality. Except as the date of childbirth approaches, and God knows best. When an unmarried woman sees in a dream a wound on her hand, the meaning of this dream lies in the fact that she is facing a major crisis in her life. Some jurists in dream interpretation have suggested that seeing a wound on the hand heals in a dream for a woman. For an unmarried woman, it also indicates that comfort and comfort have arrived for her. A dream about an injury to the right leg, in the event that the dreamer sees that he was injured in his right foot due to the loss of a toe.
